tasks.title: Create Philosophy & Soul page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Philosophy & Soul section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include content about beliefs on death, the soul, and the afterlife journey. Source sections: 1. The Nature and Philosophy of Death, 2. The Soul and Divine Justice

tasks.title: Create Major Rituals page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Major Rituals section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include essential steps from Sachkār to Uthamnā and prayers for the soul. Source sections: 4. Overview of Major Death Rituals, including subsections 4.1 through 4.12

tasks.title: Create Tower of Silence page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Tower of Silence (Dakhma) section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include information about the dakhma system, construction, and ecological wisdom. Source sections: 5. The Dakhma (Tower of Silence): Construction and Consecration, 10. The Dokhmenashini System, 12. The Tower of Silence (Dakhma): Structure, Practice, and Modern Challenges

tasks.title: Create Etiquette page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Etiquette section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include funeral decorum, rules, and community customs. Source sections: 7. Rules and Decorum at Funerals, 8. Ritual Details and Etiquette

tasks.title: Create Special Rituals page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Special Rituals section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include information about Geh-sārnā, Chinwad Pul, Dokhmenashini, and more. Source sections: 9. Special Rituals and Concepts, 11. The Sagdi at Doongerwadi

tasks.title: Create Modern Challenges page
tasks.description: Create a sub-page for the Modern Challenges section from the zoroastrian-death-rituals.md file. Include contemporary issues, vulture decline, and adaptations. Source section: 12. The Tower of Silence (Dakhma): Structure, Practice, and Modern Challenges (specifically the Modern Usage and Challenges subsection)

tasks.title: Review mobile responsiveness for Index
tasks.description:
Check index.html for mobile responsiveness issues. Verify that:
1. Layout adapts properly to mobile screens
2. Text is readable on small screens
3. Navigation works on mobile
4. Images are responsive
5. Touch targets are adequate size
6. No horizontal scrolling occurs

tasks.title: Create mobile-first media query strategy
tasks.description: Define a consistent approach for media queries across the site. This should include standard breakpoints and a mobile-first methodology.

tasks.title: Optimize images for mobile devices
tasks.description: Implement responsive images using srcset or picture elements where appropriate. Ensure images load quickly on mobile connections.

tasks.title: Improve touch target sizes
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements are at least 44x44px on mobile views for better touch accessibility.

tasks.title: Create mobile navigation enhancement
tasks.description: Improve the mobile navigation experience with better transitions, clearer indicators, and optimized touch areas.

tasks.title: Test site on multiple mobile devices
tasks.description: Test the site on various mobile devices and browsers to ensure consistent experience.
